name: trim
description: Remove whitespace from both sides of a string.

name: ltrim
description: Remove whitespace from the left side of a string.

name: rtrim
description: Remove whitespace from the right side of a string.

name: reverse
description: Reverse the characters of a string.

name: ucase
description: Change all characters in a string to upper-case.

name: lcase
description: Change all characters in a string to lower-case.

name: rcase
description: Change all characters in a string to a random case.

name: ucwords
description: Change the first character in each word of a string to upper-case.

name: lcwords
description: Change the first character in each word of a string to lower-case.

name: random
description: Return a random integer within the specified range.

name: random_decimal
description: Return a random number within the specified range, with a specified number of decimal places.

name: random_color
description: Return a random R-G-B color.

name: random_color_range
description: Return a random R-G-B color within the specified range of random RGB values.

name: mid
description: Return a portion of a string, starting at position, for the specific number of characters.

name: len
description: Return the length of a string.

name: left
description: Return the leftmost N characters.

name: right
description: Return the rightmost N characters.

name: instr
description: Return 1-based index of first occurrence, or 0.

name: instrrev
description: Return 1-based index of last occurrence, or 0.

name: replace
description: Replace all occurrences of old with new.

name: contains
description: Return True if substring is found.

name: startswith
description: Return True if text starts with prefix.

name: endswith
description: Return True if text ends with suffix.

name: padleft
description: Pad the string on the left to a given width.

name: padright
description: Pad the string on the right to a given width.

name: repeat
description: Repeat the string a specified number of times.

name: time
description: Return current local time without seconds (default HH:mm).

name: timeseconds
description: Return current local time with seconds (default HH:mm:ss).

name: now
description: Return current local date/time (optionally formatted).

name: today
description: Return current local date (optionally formatted).

name: timestamp
description: Unix seconds since epoch (UTC).

name: adddays
description: Add days to a date.

name: addhours
description: Add hours to a date.

name: addminutes
description: Add minutes to a date.

name: addseconds
description: Add seconds to a date.

name: formatdate
description: Format a date string.

name: year
description: Extract the year.

name: month
description: Extract the month (1–12).

name: day
description: Extract the day of month.

name: hour
description: Extract the hour (0–23).

name: minute
description: Extract the minute.

name: second
description: Extract the second.

name: dayofweek
description: Day of week (Sunday…Saturday).

name: dayofyear
description: Day number in year (1–366).

name: isleapyear
description: True if given year is a leap year.

name: evaluate
description: Evaluate a mathematical expression and return the result.

name: sqrt
description: Return the square root of a number.

name: pow
description: Raise a number to a given power.

name: abs
description: Absolute value of a number.

name: floor
description: Round down to the nearest integer.

name: ceiling
description: Round up to the nearest integer.

name: round
description: Round a number to N decimal places.

name: sin
description: Sine of an angle (radians).

name: cos
description: Cosine of an angle (radians).

name: tan
description: Tangent of an angle (radians).

name: log
description: Natural logarithm (base e).

name: exp
description: Exponential function e^x.

name: min
description: Minimum of two numbers.

name: max
description: Maximum of two numbers.

name: clamp
description: Constrain x to the [min,max] range.

name: factorial
description: Factorial of a non-negative integer.

name: gcd
description: Greatest common divisor of two integers.

name: lcm
description: Least common multiple of two integers.

name: toradians
description: Convert degrees to radians.

name: todegrees
description: Convert radians to degrees.

name: isprime
description: True if n is prime.

name: base64encode
description: Encode text as Base64.

name: base64decode
description: Decode Base64 to text.

name: urlencode
description: URL-encode a string.

name: urldecode
description: URL-decode a string.

name: hexencode
description: Convert text to a lowercase hex string.

name: hexdecode
description: Convert a hex string back to text.

name: tohex
description: Convert a number to hex (lowercase), optionally zero-pad.

name: fromhex
description: Parse a hex string into a number.

name: tobinary
description: Convert a number to binary, optionally zero-pad.

name: frombinary
description: Parse a binary string into a number.

name: texttobinary
description: Convert text to space-separated 8-bit bytes.

name: binarytotext
description: Convert 8-bit binary back into text.

name: md5
description: MD5 hash of text (hex).

name: sha1
description: SHA1 hash of text (hex).

name: sha256
description: SHA256 hash of text (hex).

name: window
description: Create or update a rectangular window.

name: window_ellipse
description: Create or update an elliptical or circular window.

name: window_custom
description: Create or update a custom shaped window.

name: text
description: Create or update a text area.

name: button
description: Create or update a button.

name: input
description: Create or update a single line text input.

name: timer
description: Create or update a timer.

name: font
description: Create or update a font definition. Fonts can be applied to objects like text and buttons

name: color
description: Create a color object containing references to some amount of colors. Colors can be applied to other objects.

name: border
description: Create a border. Borders can be applied to some other objects.
